content.description: Climb up and right a flaring right-leaning crack. The crux comes after the second bolt with some long powerful moves on crimps to insecure jams or slopers with a long sequence of bad smears below. It will be curious to see how this route settles once a few loose blocks/rocks divorce themselves at some point. I imagine it will be the same or harder.
content.protection: 4 bolts to quick link equipped anchor.
content.location: Obvious right leaning crack above the water tower. Can’t be much more clear.

climbs.name: An Erection Lasting Longer Than 5 Hours

content.description: Bad rock with good movement. This will clean up and become a very fun slab climb. Depending on the route you take up the bolt line, there can be multiple cruxes.
content.protection: 4 bolts to an anchor. Walk off.
content.location: To the left around the corner of HCWC.
